articles.title: $900B defense bill targets China with new investment restrictions
articles.description: House and Senate negotiators released a $900 billion defense bill targeting China with new investment restrictions, technology bans, and expanded military competition measures.
articles.content:
NEWYou can now listen to Fox News articles!
Congress released a $900 billion defense bill that reshapes U.S. economic and military competition with China by imposing new investment restrictions, banning a range of Chinese-made technologies from Penta... [7495 chars]

articles.title: Startling Sounds From 6,000-Year-Old Shells Hint at Their Ancient Use
articles.description: Oddly shaped conch shells found at Neolithic archaeological sites dating back 6,000 years could have served as technology for producing an extremely loud noise, scientists have discovered.
articles.content:
Oddly shaped conch shells found at Neolithic archaeological sites dating back 6,000 years could have served as technology for producing an extremely loud noise, scientists have discovered.
The tests were simple – picking up the shells and blowing int... [4112 chars]

articles.title: Vodafone and ATU win €4.6m EU backing for digital apprenticeships
articles.description: New project will use technology to simulate real working environments
articles.content:
Vodafone Ireland and Atlantic Technological University (ATU) have won €4.6 million from the European Union to develop digital training for engineering and construction apprentices in the west of Ireland.
They are developing a system based at ATU’s Co... [2137 chars]

articles.title: Natural Resources: The new money?
articles.description: there is going back now as far as the technological and digital advancements are concerned. the internet, ai, blockchain, crypto currency, augmented and virtual reality... they are here to stay. and it is only wise to adapt to the evolution, afterall, they do make the human life better, easier in this modern, rapidly evolving and dynamic world which is unpredictable. but, is this really the right way forward? is technology bringing too many problems in its wake? in this context, some people are hailing anan

articles.title: Right time to position Nagpur as global hub for emerging technology, cyber security: Dr Ahmed
articles.description: sharing insights on technology and innovations in it, ai, cybersecurity, dr rizwan ahmed, executive member of nagpur global foundation spoke on the theme ‘rising nagpur – technology and cyber security hub’ at the 12th edition of global nagpur summit 2025 organised by the nagpur global foundation on sunday. giving the key note address at the inaugural session of technology track, dr ahmed said, “this is the right time to position nagpur as a global hub for technology and cyber security.
articles.content:
Business Reporter :
Sharing insights on technology and innovations in IT, AI, cybersecurity, Dr Rizwan Ahmed, Executive Member of Nagpur Global Foundation spoke on the theme ‘Rising Nagpur – Technology and Cyber Security Hub’ at the 12th Edition of G... [1074 chars]

articles.title: Royal Navy head insists: We will stay a step ahead of Russia
articles.description: General Sir Gwyn Jenkins outlines plans to ‘prove our technology is better than theirs’, with state-of-the-art unmanned vessels and drones
articles.content:
Jenkins, previously embroiled in the Afghan data leak and Afghan inquiry scandals, was speaking to journalists for the first time since being handed the role as head of the navy earlier in the year.
He was allowed to speak by No 10 after months of th... [4891 chars]

articles.title: ‘We must build stronger digital ecosystem to reduce cyber security breaches’
articles.description: ali raheman, co-founder, qloud technologies ou, estonia & founder, magpie protocol, dubai, uae said, “we must build a stronger digital ecosystem, we must minimise unnecessary permissions, reduce exposure, and adopt more resilient, non-user-facing security models to reduce cyber security breaches”. he was speaking on the concluding day at the global nagpur summit 2025 technology track organised by nagpur first foundation at iim nagpur, mihan campus on sunday. he explained that there were two primary vulnerab

articles.title: Is this a good year for tax-loss harvesting?
articles.description: Thanks to market swings, evolving tax laws and new technology, it may be a good year to consider tax-loss harvesting – a strategy that can help reduce taxes and improve long-term retur
articles.content:
Thanks to market swings, evolving tax laws and new technology, it may be a good year to consider tax-loss harvesting – a strategy that can help reduce taxes and improve long-term returns.
